attributes.action: Stop the activities of Property Spy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Property Spy are an investment company who operate by buying up Green belt Land and dividing it into plots. Each plot is then apparently sold as 'investment for future building' on land where largely no planning permission exists. The land is advertisd both in the UK AND overseas.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
